availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jeremiah H. Miles (Franklin County, Kentucky farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Delilah Warfield on March 19, 1846. Father of Alexander Miles, Evan Miles John N. Miles and Lucinda Miles. Married Rebecca Warfield on August 30, 1860. Father of Frances M. Miles. Employed as a farmer in Franklin County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Franklin County Marriages, Film #266200, p. 415
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 89A
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #266203, p. 171
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Arkansas, Desha County, Jefferson, p. 484A
